ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: bonus stat allocation
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There was for awhile a big problem with people not allocating their points and then complaining about it when they realized their mistake 10 or 15 levels
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
> From: John Beckemeier [mailto:Beckemej@...]
>
>
> Hmm, when I tried to create an erudite necro in a hurry just to explore
> Paineel for a few minutes, it wouldn't let me proceed until I'd allocated
> all stat points. You sure you didn't allocate those points?
>

There was for awhile a big problem with people not allocating their points
and then complaining about it when they realized their mistake 10 or 15
levels later. When Verant realized it they changed the character creation
process to not let you proceed until your points were allocated. There was
a time, however, when you could skip that part if you chose to do so.

Anthem Dirgemaker
Level 53 Minstrel of Scarab
Solusek Ro
